item.description:
We have had some great conditions so far this year despite how the weather in Boston may look at times. If you stayed away from the mountains last weekend due to the holiday and the kids school vacation this is the weekend to reclaim your favorite trails! We have a weekend of fun planned and now would be a great time to come check out the lodge if you haven't already.

Our lodge is in Bartlett, NH just 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Black, Bretton Woods & Cranmore. Even Sunday River is only 45 minutes away.

We will be offering a dinner this weekend for $15 consisting of salad, spaghetti & meatballs, and dessert. Vegetarian option available. Please indicate in your RSVP if you would like dinner.

Guests are welcome for $20 per night lodging at the club. Full details and information will be sent to all Yes RSVPs.

All members and guests must be 21+

Hope to see you up north!
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts, February 19 - 21, 2010
